mapper.select: select level1comment.id, level1comment.comment, level1comment.name, level1comment.creator, level1comment.head_photo 'headPhoto', level2comment.id as 'childrenComment.id', level2comment.creator 'childrenComment.creator', level2comment.head_photo 'childrenComment.headPhoto', level2comment.reply_comment_id 'childrenComment.replyCommentId', level2comment.reply_user_id 'childrenComment.replyUserId', level2comment.reply_username 'childrenComment.replyUsername', level2comment.name 'childrenComment.createName', level2comment.comment 'childrenComment.comment' from ( select a.id,comment,a.creator,name,head_photo,a.gmt_create from article_comment a left join sys_user u on a.creator = u.id where article_id = #{articleId} ) as level1comment left join ( select a.id,`reply_comment_id`,`reply_username`,`reply_user_id`,comment,a.creator,u.name,head_photo from article_comment a left join sys_user u on a.creator = u.id where reply_comment_id in (select reply_comment_id from article_comment where article_id = #{articleId}) )as level2comment on level1comment.id = level2comment.reply_comment_id order by level1comment.gmt_create desc
